footer.description: Curating exceptional furniture pieces that transform spaces into sanctuaries of refined living. Each piece tells a story of craftsmanship and timeless design.

hero.subtitle: Discover the intersection of Italian craftsmanship and contemporary design.

philosophy.title: Where Craftsmanship Meets Vision
philosophy.description: At Manaku, we believe that furniture is more than function — it's an expression of how we choose to live. Each piece in our collection represents a dialogue between traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design.
philosophy.description2: We partner with master artisans across Italy and Europe who share our uncompromising commitment to quality. From the selection of premium materials to the final hand-finishing, every step is executed with precision and care.
philosophy.description3: The result is furniture that doesn't just fill a space — it transforms it. Pieces that age gracefully, develop character, and become cherished elements of your home for generations.

products.livingDesc: Sculptural sofas and refined seating for modern living spaces
products.bedroomDesc: Serene pieces designed for rest and rejuvenation

about.title: A Legacy of Refined Craftsmanship
about.heading: Born from a Passion for Excellence
about.paragraph1: Manaku was founded on a simple yet profound belief: that the spaces we inhabit should reflect our highest aspirations for beauty and quality. What began as a small atelier in Milan has grown into a globally recognized purveyor of exceptional furniture.
about.paragraph2: Our journey started over two decades ago when our founder, inspired by generations of Italian furniture-making tradition, set out to create pieces that would stand the test of time—both in durability and design.
about.paragraph3: Today, we continue this legacy by partnering with the finest craftspeople across Europe, using only the most select materials, and maintaining an unwavering commitment to excellence in every detail.
about.craftsmanship: Every piece is crafted by skilled artisans who have dedicated their lives to mastering traditional techniques. We believe that true luxury lies in the human touch—the subtle imperfections that make each piece unique.
about.materialsDesc: We source only the finest materials from responsible suppliers. From sustainably harvested hardwoods to ethically produced leathers and fabrics, every component is selected for its quality and provenance.
about.designDesc: Our designs transcend trends. We create furniture that will be just as relevant and beautiful in fifty years as it is today. This commitment to timelessness is both an aesthetic and environmental choice.
about.experienceDesc: We invite you to visit our flagship showroom in Milan, where you can experience our collection firsthand and receive personalized guidance from our design consultants.
about.introduction: Founded in 1998 in Milan, Manaku emerged from a simple belief: that furniture should be both beautiful and meaningful. What started as a small atelier has evolved into an internationally recognized brand, trusted by designers and homeowners who appreciate the intersection of art and functionality.
